body.name: VASCHY Small Messenger Bag, Vintage Canvas Leather Lightweight Crossbody Bag
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 35 mins
features: √VINTAGE STYLE: The Vaschy small messenger bag is made of water resistant canvas and superior quality cowhide leather, which is high-class and durable.The canvas is soft and smooth touch. The front flap makes the small cross-body bag unique. Moreover, there is a leather pocket at the front of the messenger bag.

√SPACIOUS COMPARTMENT:The crossbody canvas messenger bag features two main compartments.The main compartment is closed by a center zipper. There are two slip pockets,two pen slots and a zipped interior pocket in the main compartment for you to keep your pens,money, wallets, phone without worries. The front compartment under the flap is for some easy-accessed item.

√DURABLE&COMFORTABLE: The reinforced bottom makes the messenger bag more durable .With the cotton adjustable shoulder strap,it is comfortable and it can accommodate anyone. You would feel freely when carrying the lightweight small bag.

√EXTERNAL DIMENSIONS: 27x7.5x30cm/10.6x3x12inch(WxDxH). Capacity: 6Liters. Front main pocket: 27x27cm/10.6x10.6inch. Back main pocket: 27x30cm/10.6x12inch. Back small pocket:18.5x17.5cm/7.3x6.9inch. Front leather pocket: 13.5x9.5cm/5.3x3.7 inch. Shoulder Strap adjusts:80-142cm/31.5-56inch. Strap Width: 3.5cm/1.4inch. Weight: 0.6kg/1.3lb.

√ PERFECT GIFT:The Vaschy small shoulder bag is a heavy-duty bag suitable for those who like casual. It is perfect for any occasion,such as shopping, journey, business trip, Christmas gift,Fathers Day Gift and so on.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ABOUT VASCHY Simple and Neat are the spirits of Vaschy. Vaschy is an active,open-minded,lifestyle brand,dedicated to provide the everyday traveler with the perfect bags and accessories.We continue to manufacture timeless design with the finest quality. The Vaschy casual small messenger bag is made of delicate genuine cowhide leather and water-resistant canvas, which is high-class and deserves to have. This is a stylish messenger bag, perfect for both women and men. It is perfect to carry an tablet into the front pocket. And its own leather small pocket, not only could store small accessories, but also increase design sense for this small messenger bag. Also, there are a main compartment with two slots and slip pockets for your daily use. Outer flap buckle is convenient for casual use and inner zipper closure to secure your valuables.

HIGH QUALITY DETAILS ANTI-THEFT BACK POCKET A hidden compartment on the back with slip zipper provides a safe space for your important note. The leather puller makes this shoulder bag retro. ZIPPED INTERIOR POCKET The zipped pocket in the main compartment is a secret room for your cellphone. There is also a "VASCHY" leather logo attached on the inner fabric. GENUINE LEATHER POCKET The small pocket in the front is made of high quality cowhide leather and also pretty useful to hold sunglasses, some small items and so on. WATER-RESISTANT CANVAS The premium quality water resistant canvas is an ideal material, lightweight and ultra-strong at the same time. It is durable and easy to clean.

Ideal Causal Crossbody Bag for Men and Women The VASCHY canvas crossbody bag is a heavy-duty shoulder bag suitable for those who like casual or can be used as a fashion crossbody purse. It is a fantastic choice for college school, traveling, hiking, weekend getaway or travelers want to make a fashion statement. Featuring in vintage classic colors khaki, light gray and dark gray, the VASCHY retro messenger bag could let you look charming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THIS IS A GREAT BAG AT A GREAT PRICE FOR MEN OR WOMEN! GREAT POSSIBLES BAG FOR RANGE!
reviews.reviewText: This review is from a mans perspective. This is a GREAT BAG AT A GREAT PRICE! Excellent construction and professional packaging with a Thank You Card & Care Instructions! Can be used by men or women, small size but holds a lot!I had been looking for quite some times for a small messenger style bag with quickly accessible pockets to use as what is calles a “Possibles Bag” to use at the gun range for black powder muzzle loading. Most “Possibles Bags” are too small, for my needs, don’t have pockets and are much more expensive.• This bag is perfect! Looks good. Great thought was put into its design, construction and organized compartments.• The front flap is a magnetic clasp (the buckle is fake but a great accent) and is great for quick access. It can also be folded over the back for complete access to all pockets.• The front has an open leather pocket where I can quickly access my ball starter and patches but also perfect for a cell phone.• Also on the outside under the flap is a large open compartment almost as large as the bag for many accessories.• The inside which has a zipper closure has 3 vertical pockets in different widths, a large zippered pocket and the main compartment. I did find the zipper stiff so used some bore butter (lubricant) and now it's smooth as butter! :-) You can use any good lubricant.• On the very back outside is a nice size zippered compartment great for my Samsung Note or other accessories.You will not be disappointed in this bag I know I’m not! Very happy with the purchase and would buy again in a heartbeat! In fact, I am considering purchasing a 2nd one for trips and airline travel. I can now carry all my black powder muzzle loading accessories to the range in a compact, functional bag but it will fit anyone's needs! Outstanding!!! AAAAA+++++

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Where have you been all my life?
reviews.reviewText: This is a fantastic, spacious, nice looking purse. I very specifically searched for murses (men’s’ purses) because I wanted something functional for work. Women’s purses, like most products marketed to women, are sexist and useless. This bag exceeded my expectations.Our city has a lot of theft. It’s small enough that I won’t have to leave it with cashiers or get searched by security.It’s large enough to hold my iPad, a small book, a loungefly wallet, my iPhone, keys, and snacks. My life revolves around these things.It’s cute, but not feminine. I like looking cute, but I don’t want to look girly. This is a respectable, functional, nice looking satchel for a professional human.The strap is better than expected. It’s not cheap material, it’s nice. It still might catch my sweaters. May have to replace it, but don’t hate it.It reminds me of messenger bags I used to use as a teenager. It’s like a mini version.Kind of love this bag. Might order a second one in another color or just a back up for when this one gives out. It’s a keeper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pleased with the quality
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a small bag to carry a wallet, phone, with room enough for a tablet with a keyboard case, and this works perfectly. The cotton mesh strap is very thick and sturdy as well. I was concerned about ordering it out of worry that it would be thin -- it's not. It's good looking and comfortable to carry . When I don't have the tablet or a notebook in the bag (and the bag can bend) I can even wear it while wearing a seat belt in my car, yet it's still a very roomy messenger bag. I'm extremely pleased, and would buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, Well made bag.
reviews.reviewText: This product is well made.Its got a good shape which it holds and is of a thick material. When I seen this bag advertised as being made with leather, for the price I thought it was just a marketing ploy but its genuine leather which I do not know how I feel about, being an animal lover and all, and with todays Faux leathers being extremely well made, I don't know why real leather needs to be used at all.Its a decent size and holds my phone, wallet, keys, compact mirror, pencil case and binder (or interchangably my lunch and a drink as it cannot hold all of the things).however I will note with my A4 (standard for 8x11 paper) binder it will not fit in the bag if I have tabbed dividers in it.Without the tabbed dividers it fits but does stick out a bit and prevents me from zipping the bag or securing the flap, however this is a small thing which I am able to over look and still use the bag.Its for the reason above I deducted a star however this is a high quality bag for the price.PROS:- Good/High quality- Sturdy- Multiple pockets- Great for on the go people with minimal itemsCONS:- Does not hold a standard A4 binder when tabbed divivders are in use.I would reccomend this bag, however really take into account WHAT YOU ARE CARRYING BEFORE PURCHASE, this bag does not give room for error its true to measurements provided by the seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and size
reviews.reviewText: The leather seems to be real or at least is very convincing, the canvas is thick and the strap will clearly last, plenty of space for all my work and travel needs, can even fit a smaller laptop in the larger front pocket. Good product for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Got as a gift for nephew and loves it
reviews.reviewText: Perfect gift for my nephew and perfect size! Great product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Tamaño exacto y cómodo para transportar tus útiles universitarios.
reviews.reviewText: Diseño vintange, con materiales de alta calidad, muy útil para transportar de manera discreta una tablet y otros útiles universitarios.

I came back from a three week trip in Italy seeing a lot of locals (men & women) wear similar style unisex shoulder bags. I found this bag on Amazon; had good reviews so I decided to give it a go. I’ve been using this bag every day for the past two months. It’s a versatile bag I use it to go to work with wearing full business suit and for casual outings to the grocery store, social get together at restaurants and at friend’s place. The quality is well put together. The stitching, materials used and lining are all well sewn together. The leather sewn in areas to strengthen the high use areas of the cross should bag are also well thought of. This should cross bag has enough compartments separated with zippers to allow me to carry a lot of my junk from pen, gum, wallet, sun glasses, head phones, extra rolled up t-shirt, socks to change in and out of for extra curricular activities if you don’t feel like using a gym bag. The bag is a little heavier but it’s not even a consideration point if you’re like me that used a foldable small travel sized backpack or cross shoulder chest bag for the last 10 years for work and social engagements. Great value and price point. Five Stars!!
O produto é de boa qualidade chegou até mesmo antes da data prevista.
Se trata de un buen bolso, bien construido, bien rematado y de buena calidad. Totalmente recomendado.

The Vaschy arrived early which is always nice! I have purchased it to hold my iPad Air as I go about my work. It is really well made and looks and feels very durable. It’s large enough for the iPad and has plenty of room for other personal things too. I like the zippered security pockets for phone a wallet. It looks good too, my friends and colleagues have commented about how nice it looks and how practical it is.Love it!
